Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Heber Springs
There were no other sightings in Heber Springs on or around November 30th 1984
divs: Sighting DetailsThis event took place almost 30 years ago,But I still think of it often.I was coming home from Church in Greers Ferry,with car full of neices and nephews,when I turned the corner to cross the Dam ther in the middle was a cigar shaped silver object.It mad no noise and seamed to be just hovering.As I got on the Dam it shot stright down onto the Little Red River side. I speed up to see where it had gone but it was gone.I can't think of anything that could go from still to that kind of speed.Kid's were verry Frightened.
